headline.print_headline: Italy's Woeful Waste Management on Trial With Il Supremo Trash King
headline.main: Italy's Woeful Waste Management on Trial With Il Supremo Trash King

lead_paragraph: Italian businessman Manlio Cerroni thinks a monument would be a fitting recognition of his services to Rome. Instead, the 86-year-old, who spent 60 years building a global empire and a personal fortune on trash, is facing trial on a string of charges.
